Interface_name: HTTP Server - side by using Sanic in python
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Python class that implements a RESTful API for topic modeling using the Sanic framework, providing endpoints for text tokenization and LDA model inference.

Class Description: The FamiliaAPI class encapsulates a topic modeling service that exposes HTTP endpoints for text processing. It initializes with model configurations, sets up route handlers, and manages inference engines for LDA and SLDA models.

Attributes:

app: [Sanic] - The Sanic application instance for handling HTTP requests
model_name: [str] - Name of the topic model being used
model_path: [str] - Filesystem path to the model directory
n_workers: [int] - Number of worker processes for parallel processing
model_dir: [str] - Full path to the model directory
emb_file: [str] - Filename for the word embeddings model
inference_engine_lda: [InferenceEngineWrapper] - Wrapper for LDA model inference
inference_engine_slda: [InferenceEngineWrapper] - Wrapper for SLDA model inference
twe: [TopicalWordEmbeddingsWrapper] - Wrapper for topical word embeddings
lda_topic_words: [defaultdict] - Dictionary storing topic words and their scores

Methods:

__init__: [Name](model_path: str, model_name: str, n_workers: int = None) -> None - Initializes the API service with model configurations and sets up routes
_read_topic_words_from_file: [Name](topic_words_file_name: str = 'topic_words.lda.txt') -> defaultdict - Reads topic words from a file and returns them as a dictionary
_get_param: [Name](request, param_name, default_value=None, is_list=False) -> Union[str, List[str]] - Extracts parameters from HTTP requests
_strip_to_none: [Name](text: str) -> Optional[str] - Cleans and validates input text
_response: [Name](success: bool = True, data=None, message=None) -> HTTPResponse - Constructs standardized JSON responses
_error_response: [Name](message: str = 'Invalid request') -> HTTPResponse - Creates error responses
_setup_routes: [Name]() -> None - Defines all API endpoints and their handlers
run: [Name]() -> None - Starts the Sanic server with configured workers
